unnormalised: Entertainment Buzz: Are Ranbir & Alia on the Rocks?
normalised: Entertainment Buzz: Are Ranbir and Alia on the Rocks?

unnormalised: Bollywood's favorite couple, Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt, have fans buzzing! Whispers are getting louder than a dhols at a Diwali celebration. Rumour has it that things aren't exactly 'All Is Well' behind the scenes.
normalised: Bollywood's favorite couple, Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt, have fans buzzing! Whispers are getting louder than a dhols at a Diwali celebration. Rumor has it that things aren't exactly 'All Is Well' behind the scenes.

unnormalised: Sources close to the couple, speaking on the condition of anonymity (obviously, drama!), suggest Ranbir's been spending late nights at the Film and Television Institute of India (FTII), "immersing himself in method acting", apparently prepping for his next role. Alia, meanwhile, has been spotted at Dharma Productions parties looking unusually pensive.
normalised: Sources close to the couple, speaking on the condition of anonymity (obviously, drama!), suggest Ranbir's been spending late nights at the Film and Television Institute of India (F T I I), "immersing himself in method acting", apparently prepping for his next role. unnormalised: Is this just the stress of balancing parenthood and hectic careers, or is there trouble in paradise? Insiders are pointing to "creative differences" and "scheduling conflicts," classic Bollywood jargon for 'we're probably headed for splitsville.' Only time will tell if these two can work it out. Stay tuned for more updates as this spicy masala unfolds! We'll be watching...
